attributes.comment:
The proposed fee hike is unexplicably outrageous. The increases are TOO DRASTIC.
Some fees have more than doubled! I have never seen a business operate this way
to support the cost of doing business. I think a re-evaluation needs to be done
to accurately reflect a fair and reasonable solution which will benefit both
parties. USCIS needs to realize that their proposed fee hikes are out of reach
for many immigrants and also so sudden. If the fee increase needs to be that
drastic, it should be rolled out quarterly or yearly.

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Commented Submitted By Annoymous
